# Press Kit Template

Use this template to create a media kit for press and influencer outreach.

---

## Template

Create a folder structure:
```
press-kit/
├── README.md           # This document
├── company-overview.md
├── founder-bio.md
├── fact-sheet.md
├── screenshots/
│   ├── product-01.png
│   ├── product-02.png
│   └── ...
├── logos/
│   ├── logo-dark.svg
│   ├── logo-light.svg
│   ├── logo-icon.svg
│   └── logo-wordmark.svg
└── photos/
    └── founder-headshot.jpg
```

---

## README.md

```markdown
# {Product Name} Press Kit

Thank you for your interest in covering {Product Name}.

This press kit contains everything you need:
- [Company Overview](company-overview.md)
- [Founder Bio](founder-bio.md)
- [Fact Sheet](fact-sheet.md)
- [Screenshots](screenshots/)
- [Logos](logos/)
- [Photos](photos/)

## Quick Links
- Website: {url}
- Demo: {url}
- Product Hunt: {url}

## Contact
For press inquiries:
- Email: press@{domain}
- Twitter: @{handle}

## Usage Guidelines
- Please use official logos without modification
- Screenshots can be cropped but not edited
- Please link to {url} when mentioning the product
```

---

## company-overview.md

```markdown
# {Product Name}

## One-Liner
{10-word description}

## What We Do
{Product Name} is a {category} that helps {target audience} to {primary benefit}.

{2-3 sentences expanding on the product, how it works, and why it matters}

## The Problem
{Describe the problem being solved - make it relatable}

## Our Solution
{Describe how the product solves it differently}

## Key Features
- **{Feature 1}:** {One-sentence description}
- **{Feature 2}:** {One-sentence description}
- **{Feature 3}:** {One-sentence description}

## Traction
- Launch date: {Month Year}
- Users: {Number}+
- {Other relevant metrics}

## Why Now
{Why is this the right time for this product? Trends, technology, market shifts}

## Vision
{Where is this headed? What's the bigger picture?}

## Contact
- Website: {url}
- Email: {email}
- Twitter: @{handle}
```

---

## founder-bio.md

```markdown
# Founder Bio

## Short Bio (50 words)
{Name} is the founder of {Product Name}, a {category} that helps {audience} {benefit}. {Previous notable experience or credential}. {Personal detail that makes them interesting}.

## Medium Bio (100 words)
{Name} is the founder of {Product Name}.

{Background paragraph - what led them here, relevant experience}

{What drove them to build this - the story}

{Current focus and what excites them about the space}

{Name} is based in {location} and can be reached at {email}.

## Long Bio (200+ words)
{Name} is the founder of {Product Name}, a {category} helping {audience} to {benefit}.

### Background
{Paragraph on professional background}

### The Origin Story
{How and why they started building this}

### Vision
{What they're working toward}

### Personal
{Brief personal details - hobbies, location, fun facts}

### Connect
- Twitter: @{handle}
- LinkedIn: {url}
- Email: {email}

## Quotes for Attribution

**On the problem:**
> "{Quote about the problem being solved}"

**On the solution:**
> "{Quote about the product's approach}"

**On the vision:**
> "{Quote about where this is headed}"
```

## fact-sheet.md

```markdown
# {Product Name} Fact Sheet

## Company
| | |
|-|-|
| Name | {Product Name} |
| Type | {SaaS / App / Tool / Platform} |
| Founded | {Month Year} |
| Location | {City, Country} |
| Website | {url} |

## Product
| | |
|-|-|
| Category | {Product category} |
| Target User | {Who it's for} |
| Pricing | {Free / Freemium / Paid} starting at ${X}/mo |
| Platforms | {Web / iOS / Android / Desktop} |

## Traction
| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Launch Date | {Date} |
| Total Users | {Number}+ |
| {Key Metric} | {Value} |
| {Key Metric} | {Value} |

## Team
| Name | Role |
|------|------|
| {Name} | Founder |

## Funding
{Self-funded / Bootstrapped / Raised ${X}}

## Key Milestones
| Date | Milestone |
|------|-----------|
| {Month Year} | {Milestone} |
| {Month Year} | {Milestone} |
| {Month Year} | {Milestone} |

## Awards & Recognition
- {Award or notable mention}
- {Award or notable mention}

## Press Coverage
- {Publication}: "{Article title}" ({Date})
- {Publication}: "{Article title}" ({Date})

## Contact
| | |
|-|-|
| Press Email | press@{domain} |
| General Email | hello@{domain} |
| Twitter | @{handle} |
```

---

## Logo Guidelines

```markdown
# Logo Usage Guidelines

## Primary Logo
Use the primary logo on white or light backgrounds.
- File: `logos/logo-dark.svg`
- Minimum size: 100px wide
- Clear space: Equal to the height of the icon on all sides

## Light Version
Use on dark backgrounds.
- File: `logos/logo-light.svg`

## Icon Only
For small spaces like favicons or app icons.
- File: `logos/logo-icon.svg`

## Wordmark Only
When the icon is displayed separately.
- File: `logos/logo-wordmark.svg`

## Don'ts
- Don't change the colors
- Don't stretch or distort
- Don't add effects or shadows
- Don't place on busy backgrounds
- Don't recreate or modify

## Colors
| Color | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| Primary | #{hex} | Logo, CTAs |
| Secondary | #{hex} | Accents |
| Text | #{hex} | Body text |

## Fonts
- Headings: {Font name}
- Body: {Font name}
```

---

## Screenshot Requirements

### Recommended Screenshots
1. **Hero shot** - Main interface, empty state or filled
2. **Key feature 1** - Most impressive capability
3. **Key feature 2** - Second most impressive
4. **Key feature 3** - Third feature
5. **Mobile view** - If applicable
6. **Before/after** - If showing transformation

### Specifications
- Resolution: 1920x1080 or 2x for retina
- Format: PNG (preferred) or JPEG
- Background: Clean, realistic data
- Annotations: None (raw screenshots)

---

## Sample Press Release

```markdown
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

# {Product Name} Launches to Help {Audience} {Achieve Outcome}

**{City, State} — {Date}** — {Product Name}, a new {category}, launched today to help {target audience} {achieve primary benefit}. The product addresses {key problem} that {audience} face.

"{Quote from founder about why they built this}," said {Name}, founder of {Product Name}.

{Product Name} works by {brief explanation of how it works}. Key features include:

- {Feature 1}
- {Feature 2}
- {Feature 3}

"{Quote from early user about their experience}," said {User name}, {title}.

{Product Name} is available now at {url}. {Pricing information}.

### About {Product Name}
{Product Name} is a {category} that helps {audience} to {benefit}. Founded in {year}, the company is based in {location}. For more information, visit {url}.

### Contact
{Name}
{Email}
{Phone}
```

---

## Usage Notes

1. Keep fact sheet updated as metrics change
2. Have multiple resolution versions of logos
3. Take screenshots with realistic (not lorem ipsum) data
4. Prepare both short and long founder bios
5. Make everything easily downloadable (zip file or public folder)
